title: Cranberry-Orange Relish
ingredients: ½ Cointreau; or, other orange based liqueur
instructions: In a blender or food processor, combine the cranberries, orange, and lemon and process (pulsing if using a blender) until the mixture is uniformly coarsely “chopped.”  Add the sugar, pecans, and the Cointreau and process (pulse) briefly simply to mix.  Cover and let stand at room temperature for 12 hours before bring to the table.

Source:  The Colonial Williamsburg Tavern Cookbook, by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation, Recipes Developed by John R. Gonzales, Edited by Charles Pierce, Clarkson Potter/Publishers, New York, © 2001 by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.
